channel.title: Comments on: Captured this still on Ghost of Tsushima, the setting in this game is just phenomenal!

item.title: By: MedicalCrab7979

item.description: the flute is exclusively for playing while a person is crawling away mortally wounded before you finish them
item.content:encoded: the flute is exclusively for playing while a person is crawling away mortally wounded before you finish them
